amber: Lets have a gliding contest author. Remember that I don't go easy on anyone, even you!
bennett: No one's joined me on an adventure in ages. C'mon, let's go author!
ayaka: Delighted to make your acquaintance author.
kokomi: Let's go on a journey together author. My journey with you will be an opportunity to unwind...
yelan: Hello, author. I think you may need my help, and I just so happen to need yours. In other words — you scratch my back, I'll scratch yours.
zhongli: author , where do you want to go next? If you'd like to see Liyue's tourist spots, I have a few references.
wanderer: Do I have to say this? ...Fine, let's get this over with. Welcome author.
venti: Allow me to join you on your quest author. I must see to it that the bards of the world tell the your tales!
raiden: author, you have arrived just in time for dessert. What? Why not? What do you mean, entrées come first?
nahida: Nice to meet you author! Hehe, I've actually been watching you for a long time already. I want to hear all about your travel stories.
klee: author, do you wanna come fish blasting with me? I'll get grounded for a whole day, but it's way worth it coz the fish taste sooo goood!
keqing: We've been on our fair share of adventures together haven’t we author? This one will be no different.
cyno: author, now that you are here. Are you up for a game of Genius Invokation TCG?
tartaglia: Greetings, comrade author! You're raring to go today, I see.
collei: Trainee Forest Ranger Collei, reporting for duty! Phew, I think I've finally got that line down! ...I—I didn't get any of it wrong, did I author?
xingqiu: If my calculations are correct, Wanwen Bookhouse is due to receive a batch of new releases today. author, might we add a small detour to our adventure?
noelle: author seem tired. Would you like some tea? I'll brew you some. Do you take sugar? One cube, or two?
fischl: I, Fischl, Prinzessin der Verurteilung, descend upon this land by the call of fate an— Oh, author is also a traveler from another world? Very well, I grant you permission to travel with me.
qiqi: author, do you know what? Uhh... neither do I. I... already forgot.
yae: Say author, why don't you write out your story and submit it to Yae Publishing House? I'm sure that would keep me amused— Ahem, I'm sure it would be a best-seller.
beidou: Yo author, good day. I'm about to head off, coming with me?
kazuha: There are leaves around — and I know just the tune to accompany them, if you wish to hear it author.
thoma: Hey author... how about we go for a nice meal some time? My treat, of course.
yoimiya: author, let's make fireworks! Like these, see? Sparkling, crackling, little fireworks~
itto: The sky is clear and the sun is shining... Time to get the Onikabuto out for some training! C'mon author, let's go!
nilou: I have a performance at Zubayr Theater tonight. author, do you want some tickets?
eula: You want to learn some Favonius Bladework? Heh, alright then, I'll teach you, alright, mark my words author...
diluc: It's been a long while since I played chess with anyone but my butler. I just so happen to have a moment. Care to play a round author?
xiao: author if death comes knocking at your door, call out my name. Adeptus Xiao. I will be here when you call.
albedo: author would you oblige me by serving as my assistant?
hu tao: Need a hand, need a hand? I'm here! If author need some assistance, I'm here to give it my all to the very end!
yun jin: At long last, I finally have the great honor of meeting you today author. We have been performing at Heyu Tea House as of late, and we'd be honored to have you attend a performance sometime.
ganyu: author is it time to begin work?
